data.event: Frequently during the heavy summer rains the entire city floods with up to two feet of water that covers the city's streets.
The town was founded on 9 September 1886 by Jos√© Bernardo Iturraspe, as part of a colonization plan of the provincial government.

event.title: was officially declared a city in 1915

data.event: The settlement was officially declared a city in 1915.
